detail.content: Nadia N. Cureton                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Associate Director         Faculty Services         Stern School of Business         44 West 4th Street, Suite 11-52         New York, NY 10012         Tel: 212-998-0766         Fax: 212-995-4212         Email: ncureton@stern.nyu.edu                                                                                             Biography                      Nadia rejoined Stern in July 2003 after a two-year stint as a Program Assistant at World Wildlife Fund (WWF) in Washington D.C. At WWF, Nadia worked in the Education department where she managed the Education for Nature scholarship program for Central and West Africa. Before WWF, Nadia was the Administrative Coordinator for the Center for Digital Economy Research at the Stern School of Business.         Nadia has a distinctive accent, a mishmash picked up from growing up in Cameroon, West Africa, attending a British boarding school for girls in the tea plantations of Kenya, East Africa, living on Long Island for four years and NYC for 2 years. She speaks and reads French fluently.     She holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in film studies and production from Hofstra University and     is pursuing a Master of Public Administration degree in International Public Policy and Management at NYU's Wagner Graduate School of Public Service.     Nadia's hobbies include website design and development, the cinema (somewhat of a film noir aficionado), watching television (someone get her TIVO! ), dancing all night, and reading mystery, suspense, thriller novels.                                        Favorite Things (People!)                         Her nieces and nephews       Movies: All things Lord of the Rings related, The Godfather Trilogy, Three Kings, Crash, Brokeback Mountain, and too many others to list.       Dramas: CSI, Battlestar Galactica, 24, MI-5, Law & Order (all 3), The Wire, Deadwood, The Closer to name a few.       Comedies: Seinfeld (she's seen every episode at least 5 times), Friends, Sex & the City, The Daily Show w/ Jon Stewart, Extras, The Office (US version).       Books: Lord of the Rings , The Hobbit , JRR Tolkien; Shogun , James Clavell; Angels Flight , Michael Connelly; Macbeth , William Shakespeare; The Da Vinci Code , Dan Brown.       NY Yankees (bleed Yankee blue!), NY Jets, NJ Nets, Washington Redskins (OY!), Green Bay Packers (Brett Favre rules!)                                 Not So Favorite Things                         Reality TV Shows          Doors banging shut          Car horns          Snow and temperatures below 60 degrees       Boston Red Sox, NY Knicks, New England Patriots, St. Louis Rams       Spam email                                                                                                                                                     Personal Menu                                                                        Resumes              Professional          Other               Pictures          Egypt          Rome         Florence                                            Main Menu                                                                         Faculty         Services                 Faculty         Index           Faculty         Resources (restricted)           Resources for new faculty          Stern                Home           SternLinks                                                                                                                                         Copyright © 2006 Leonard Stern School of Business
